name: dist/index.es.js
createEvent
description: Creates a new event that allows subscribers to add and remove event handlers.

name: globalReducer
description: Creates a global reducer for use within any number of components. The function returned allows for a selector function to be passed to limit the re-renders of the consuming component.

params.name: initialValue
params.description: The initial value for the state.

params.name: onStateChange
params.description: onStateChange An optional callback for when the state changes. Can be used for persisting to local storage.

types: function(selector: function = undefined, onComponentStateChanged: function = undefined): [Object, Object]

name: usePromise
description: Use a promise and receive [data, error, loading] values. It is strongly recommended to use in conjunction with useMemo.

name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "react-hook-utils",
  "version": "1.0.1",
  "description": "",
  "author": "",
  "license": "MIT",
  "repository": "https://github.com/jacob-ebey/react-hook-utils.git",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "module": "dist/index.es.js",
  "jsnext:main": "dist/index.es.js",
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=8",
    "npm": ">=5"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "test": "cross-env CI=1 react-scripts test --env=jsdom",
    "coverage": "cross-env CI=1 react-scripts test --coverage --env=jsdom",
    "test:watch": "react-scripts test --env=jsdom",
    "build": "rollup -c && esdoc",
    "start": "rollup -c -w",
    "prepare": "npm run build",
    "predeploy": "cd example && npm install && npm run build",
    "deploy": "gh-pages -d example/build"
  },
  "peerDependencies": {
    "react": "^16.7.0-alpha.0",
    "react-dom": "^16.7.0-alpha.0",
    "scheduler": "^0.11.0-alpha.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@svgr/rollup": "^2.4.1",
    "babel-core": "^6.26.3",
    "babel-eslint": "^8.2.5",
    "babel-plugin-external-helpers": "^6.22.0",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.7.0",
    "babel-preset-react": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-preset-stage-0": "^6.24.1",
    "cross-env": "^5.1.4",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^5.0.1",
    "eslint-config-standard": "^11.0.0",
    "eslint-config-standard-react": "^6.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.13.0",
    "eslint-plugin-node": "^7.0.1",
    "eslint-plugin-promise": "^4.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.10.0",
    "eslint-plugin-standard": "^3.1.0",
    "gh-pages": "^1.2.0",
    "react": "16.7.0-alpha.0",
    "react-dom": "16.7.0-alpha.0",
    "react-scripts": "^1.1.4",
    "react-testing-library": "^5.2.3",
    "rollup": "^0.64.1",
    "rollup-plugin-babel": "^3.0.7",
    "rollup-plugin-commonjs": "^9.1.3",
    "rollup-plugin-node-resolve": "^3.3.0",
    "rollup-plugin-peer-deps-external": "^2.2.0",
    "rollup-plugin-postcss": "^1.6.2",
    "rollup-plugin-url": "^1.4.0",
    "scheduler": "0.11.0-alpha.0"
  },
  "files": [
    "dist",
    "README.md"
  ]
}
name: package.json
